tool_description: Serpstat API provides a large amount of data without using the service interface.
name: Serpstat
title: Serpstat

api_list.name: SEO Domain History
api_list.description: SerpstatDomainProcedure.getDomainsHistory method provides historical data for the analyzed domain. You will get the data on total number of keywords, visibility, traffic, number of ads, etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://serpstat1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serpstat1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: SEO Domain Summary
api_list.description: SerpstatDomainProcedure.getDomainsInfo — method provides the summary data for an array of domains. You will get this data:  visibility, traffic, number of organic/paid keywords, number of ads, etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://serpstat1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serpstat1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Backlinks Summary Report
api_list.description: The getSummary method provides data about link profile of a website: a number of external links, referring IP addresses and subnets, a number of referring domains and subdomains, domain authority indicator and types of referring links.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://serpstat1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serpstat1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Referring Domains
api_list.description: The getRefDomains method provides a list of referring domains of a website you analyze. You will get this data: number of referring domains/subdomains/links,  number of nofollow/dofollow links, domain rank, etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://serpstat1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serpstat1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
